text: Ary Façanha de Sá (1 April 1928 – 16 August 2020) was a Brazilian long jumper. At the 1952 Summer Olympics he finished fourth in the long jump. He also competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics.Athletics - men's long jump 1948-1964 - Full Olympians He became South American long jump champion in 1952, won silver medals in 1956 and 1958 and a bronze medal in 1954.South American Championships (Men) - GBR Athletics Sa died on 16 August 2020 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian athletes Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Long jumpers
title: Ary de Sá
